title: A Blockchain-based Platform for Reliable Inference and Training of Large-Scale Models. (arXiv:2305.04062v1 [cs.DC])
abstract: As artificial intelligence (AI) continues to permeate various domains, concerns surrounding trust and transparency in AI-driven inference and training processes have emerged, particularly with respect to potential biases and traceability challenges. Decentralized solutions such as blockchain have been proposed to tackle these issues, but they often struggle when dealing with large-scale models, leading to time-consuming inference and inefficient training verification. To overcome these limitations, we introduce BRAIN, a Blockchain-based Reliable AI Network, a novel platform specifically designed to ensure reliable inference and training of large models. BRAIN harnesses a unique two-phase transaction mechanism, allowing real-time processing via pipelining by separating request and response transactions. Each randomly-selected inference committee commits and reveals the inference results, and upon reaching an agreement through a smart contract, then the requested operation is executed us

translated_title: 基于区块链的可靠大规模模型推理和训练平台
translated_abstract: 随着人工智能在各个领域的普及，AI驱动的推理和训练过程中涉及可信度和透明度的问题引起关注，特别是涉及潜在偏差和可追溯性挑战的问题。虽然提出了区块链等分散化解决方案来解决这些问题，但它们在处理大规模模型时常常遇到挑战，导致推理耗时，训练验证低效。为了克服这些限制，我们介绍了BRAIN（基于区块链的可靠AI网络），这是一个特别设计的新平台，旨在确保大模型的可靠推理和训练。BRAIN利用独特的两阶段交易机制，通过分离请求和响应交易，允许实时处理通过流水线。每个随机选择的推理委员会都会提交并公布推理结果，在通过智能合约达成一致意见后，才会执行所请求的操作。
tldr: BRAIN是一个可靠的基于区块链的AI平台，能够确保大规模模型的可信推理和训练，通过独特的两阶段交易机制实现实时处理。
en_tdlr: BRAIN is a reliable blockchain-based AI platform that ensures trustworthy inference and training of large-scale models, utilizing a unique two-phase transaction mechanism for real-time processing.
